personalInfo.name: Dhaval Gediya
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.subtitle: UI/UX Designer & Web Developer
personalInfo.description: I'm a passionate developer with expertise in creating modern web applications and user-friendly interfaces. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful designs.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a dedicated full-stack developer with a passion for creating innovative web solutions. My expertise spans across frontend and backend technologies, with a keen eye for design and user experience.

summary.title: DHAVAL GEDIYA
summary.description: Innovative and deadline-driven Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience designing and developing user-centered web applications from initial concept to final, polished deliverable.

education.description: Specialized in Computer Science with relevant coursework in Software Engineering, Database Management, and Web Development. Completed academic projects including developing a full-stack web app for the final year project.

responsibilities: Working as a software engineer specializing in React.js technology
Developing and maintaining web applications using modern React ecosystem
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions
Implementing best practices in frontend development and code optimization
Worked as a MERN stack developer building full-stack web applications
Developed frontend interfaces using React.js and backend APIs with Node.js
Implemented database solutions using MongoDB and integrated various services
Collaborated with design and product teams to deliver user-centric solutions
Developed full-stack web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks
Built responsive user interfaces and robust backend systems
Worked on database design and API development
Participated in code reviews and maintained high code quality standards
Developed desktop and web applications using C# and .NET framework
Built scalable software solutions for various business requirements
Worked with databases and implemented efficient data management systems
Gained experience in software development lifecycle and agile methodologies

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Professional web development services using modern technologies like React, Node.js, and cloud platforms.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Creating intuitive and engaging user interfaces with focus on user experience and accessibility.

services.title: Mobile App Development
services.description: Cross-platform mobile application development using React Native and Flutter.

services.title: API Development
services.description: RESTful API development and integration with databases and third-party services.

services.title: E-commerce Solutions
services.description: Complete e-commerce platform development with payment integration and inventory management.

services.title: Consulting
services.description: Technical consulting for project architecture, technology selection, and development best practices.

portfolio.title: Health Care Project
portfolio.description: Complete digital patient file system that follows patients throughout their hospital stay, helping healthcare staff coordinate better care.
portfolio.details: 15-member team project creating a comprehensive healthcare management system with real-time patient tracking and coordinated care features.
